abstract: Amid recent commodities boom that has fueled a surged in consolidation within the industry, Alcoa announced Thursday that it has hired a longtime outside adviser to head up its mergers and acquisitions efforts.
lead_paragraph: Amid recent commodities boom that has fueled a surged in consolidation within the industry, Alcoa announced Thursday that it has hired a longtime outside adviser to head up its mergers and acquisitions efforts.

headline.main: Alcoa to Hire Citi Banker as Its Top Deal-Maker
